resources.string: %s requests microphone permission
After selecting Allow in the dialog below, you can record voice messages or shoot videos to send to friends, use audio/video calls, and more.
Microphone permission is not enabled
Enable microphone permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to use voice messages, short videos, audio/video calls, and other features normally.
%s requests camera permission

After selecting Allow in the dialog below, you can take photos or videos to send to friends, use video calls, group live broadcasts, and more. You can also access the camera in other scenarios to take photos and videos.
Camera permission is not enabled
Enable camera permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to use photo taking, short videos, QR code scanning, and other features normally.
%s requests Bluetooth permission
After selecting Allow in the dialog below, you can use Bluetooth devices for audio/video calls.
Bluetooth permission is not enabled
Enable Bluetooth permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to use Bluetooth devices for audio/video calls normally.
%s requests photo access permission
After selecting Allow in the dialog below, you can access your photo album, send photos to friends, update your avatar, and more.
Photo access permission is not enabled
Enable photo permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to send photos, update your avatar, and use other features normally.
%s requests video access permission
After selecting Allow in the dialog below, you can access your photo album and send videos to friends.
Video access permission is not enabled
Enable video permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to send videos and use other features normally.
%s requests external storage access permission
After selecting Allow in the dialog below, you can access your photo album, send images and videos to friends, update your avatar, and more.
External storage access permission is not enabled
Enable external storage access permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to send images, videos, files, update your avatar, and use other features normally.
%s requests notification permission
After selecting Allow in the dialog below, when the app is running in the background and receives messages, you will be notified
Notification permission is not enabled
Enable notification permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to receive message notifications in time.
%s requests location permission
After selecting Allow in the dialog below, you can send location messages
Location permission is not enabled
Enable location permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to send location messages.
